CHAT.comment: <Dear SantaClaus , I would like a Cdplayer just like mom's. please please please From Samantha I think>.

Context notes say that Chi writes very quickly. She holds the book that she is writing on at an angle so that Mot can read her letter. Chi comes up with the idea of writing to Santa Claus by herself and composes the text on her own. Mot corrects punctuation and form and assists in spelling. Chi is creative , willing and humorous during this task.

u.a: Chi whispers to Mot who she wants to write to
Chi stops and is about to tear the sheet off and start again
